item.title: About Me
item.description: Interrelated and indivisible aspects of my life. Each component informs and enriches the others. Science I learned to appreciate science from my parents. My mother taught me to ask questions, Currently, I am a PhD candidate at the University of Alberta. I am proud to work and study under the supervision of Professor Lindsay J. LeBlanc at the University of Alberta in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. Click here to access my CV.
